comments.author: Werner
comments.body: I'm beginning to wonder if Matt really went to the Air Force. I suspect he might have started a farm in western Colorado instead. That might explain the photo above. Perhaps those pictures we've seen before of airplanes are really from crop dusting school. Hmmm...

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Can you imagine waking up to this? A woozy night in the Officer's Club. Elbows still sticky with rum and head throbbing from the Pensicuda's asthmatic 80 watt P.A. system, he must've felt like death. And then to scrape down the hallway from the bathroom, certain the very earth was cracking under the worst hangover ever conceived, he sees this _thing_, sprawled over the dinette in a drying pool of RC Cola and cracker crumbs. It turns, looks him in the eye, and says, "Hi, I'm Matt. Can I go home now?" DU
